00079 template <class Interface>
00080 void TFactoryMember<Interface>::Init(const IComponent* ownerPtr, const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo)
00081 {
00082        BaseClass::Init(ownerPtr, staticInfo, &m_definitionComponentPtr);
00083 }

00085 
00086 template <class Interface>
00087 bool TFactoryMember<Interface>::IsValid() const
00088 {
00089        return (m_definitionComponentPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::IsValid();
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094 template <class Interface>
00095 IComponent* TFactoryMember<Interface>::CreateComponent() const
00096 {
00097        if ((m_definitionComponentPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::IsValid()){
00098               const IComponent* parentPtr = m_definitionComponentPtr->GetParentComponent();
00099               if (parentPtr != NULL){
00100                      const std::string& componentId = BaseClass::operator*();
00101 
00102                      std::string baseId;
00103                      std::string subId;
00104                      BaseClass2::SplitId(componentId, baseId, subId);
00105                      I_ASSERT(subId.empty());    // explicit subelement ID are not implemented correctly
00106 
00107                      return parentPtr->CreateSubcomponent(baseId);
00108               }
00109        }
00110 
00111        return NULL;
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 template <class Interface>
00116 Interface* TFactoryMember<Interface>::CreateInstance() const
00117 {
00118        istd::TDelPtr<IComponent> newComponentPtr(CreateComponent());
00119        if (newComponentPtr.IsValid()){
00120               Interface* retVal = BaseClass2::ExtractInterface<Interface>(newComponentPtr.GetPtr());
00121               if (retVal != NULL){
00122                      newComponentPtr.PopPtr();
00123 
00124                      return retVal;
00125               }
00126        }
00127 
00128        return NULL;
00129 }

00134 template <class Interface>
00135 Interface* TFactoryMember<Interface>::ExtractInterface(istd::IPolymorphic* instancePtr, const std::string& subId)
00136 {
00137        icomp::IComponent* componentPtr = dynamic_cast<icomp::IComponent*>(instancePtr);
00138        I_ASSERT(componentPtr != NULL);
00139 
00140        if (componentPtr != NULL){
00141               return BaseClass2::ExtractInterface<Interface>(componentPtr, subId);
00142        }
00143 
00144        return NULL;
00145 }
